response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to us, but we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000. We understand its worth to you might be $1,000,000, and we aim to make this acquisition as favorable as possible for both parties. Should you decide to proceed, please let us know, and we will arrange for the immediate delivery and transfer of ownership. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
